title: News: Stream TV On the Radio’s upcoming album
content:
In 2008, TV On the Radio released Dear Science, a record named album of the year by a wide array of publications including Pitchfork, The Guardian and MTV.

Now in 2011, the follow-up, Nine Types of Light, is available in an exclusive stream from the Guardian’s website described as a “more relaxed affair.” But Die-hard fans don’t fear, TV On the Radio classic sound is still there, it just sounds like they’ve had a bit more time to put it together, putting more care and attention into producing each and every track.

Nine Types of Light is the fourth studio album by American band TV on the Radio, set to be released April 12, 2011.

Listen now at The Guardian’s music blog

Track listing:

  1. “Second Song”
  2. “Keep Your Heart”
  3. “You”
  4. “No Future Shock”
  5. “Killer Crane”
  6. “Will Do”
  7. “New Cannonball Blues”
  8. “Repetition”
  9. “Forgotten”
  10. “Caffeinated Consciousness”
